Citation

Bischl B, Lang M, Kotthoff L, Schiffner J, Richter J, Studerus E, Casalicchio G and Jones Z (2016). “mlr: Machine Learning in R.” Journal of Machine Learning Research, 17(170), pp. 1-5. http://jmlr.org/papers/v17/15-066.html.
